Title: Treasure Island
Actors: Eddie Izzard, Toby Regbo, Rupert Penry-Jones, Daniel Mays
Plot: Young Jim Hawkins is the only one who can sucessfully get a schooner to a legendary Island known for buried Treasure. But aboard the ship is a mysterious cook named John Silver, whose true motivation on the journey challenges Jim's trust in the entire crew.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 nominations.
